Server.Core

Class ZipUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.Core.ZipUtil

  • public class ZipUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for zip/unzip, gzip/gunzip, and tar/untar. Tar/untar relies on commons-compress-1.3.jar from http://commons.apache.org/compress/
    Version:
    0.8, 12/15/2012
    Author:
    Frank Smutniak, Center for Digital Research in the Humanities, http://cdrh.unl.edu
